INVOKE.COMMENT: Get configuration values from persisted location

MAP.NAME: $null
MAP.COMMENT: Set action -- and assign configuration values to local variables for use later

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: Default value of retries to 5 and backoff to 2 and timout to 180 if config settings not found
